etymology.interpretation: The term 软件(軟件) (ruǎnjiàn) is used to contrast the intangible nature of software with the tangible "hardware" of a computer. Here, 软(軟) (ruǎn) refers to the softness or flexibility of the software, in contrast to the solid, physical components of a computer, while 件(件) (jiàn) denotes an "item" or "component," indicating that it is a part of a larger system.

examples.chinese: 我安装了软件(我安裝了軟件)。
这个软件很实用(這個軟件很實用)，帮助我提高效率(幫助我提高效率)。
examples.pinyin: Zhège ruǎnjiàn hěn shíyòng, bāngzhù wǒ tígāo xiàolǜ.
examples.english: This software is very practical and helps me improve efficiency.

examples.chinese: 使用开源软件(使用開源軟件)，促进了技术创新(促進了技術創新)。
examples.pinyin: Shǐyòng kāiyuán ruǎnjiàn, cùjìn le jìshù chuàngxīn.
examples.english: Using open source software fosters technological innovation.
